CustomField.formula: SUBSTITUTE( IF(INCLUDES(BU__c, "AMPE"), "AMPE; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(BU__c, "Euro PE"), "EUPE; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(BU__c, "Asia PE"), "ASIAPE; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(BU__c, "Public Toe-holds"), "TOE HOLD; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(BU__c, "Asia NGT"), "Asia NGT; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(BU__c, "NGT"), "NGT; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(BU__c, "Healthcare Strategic Growth"), "HCSG; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(BU__c, "Healthcare Royalty and Income"), "HCRI; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(BU__c, "Energy"), "ERA; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(BU__c, "Infrastructure"), "INFRA; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(BU__c, "Infrastructure - Core"), "INFRA - CORE; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(BU__c, "Real Estate Equity"), "RE; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(BU__c, "Real Estate Credit"), "RE; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(BU__c, "AMPE-Core"), "CORE; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(BU__c, "Eur-Core"), "CORE; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(BU__c, "Asia-Core"), "CORE; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(BU__c, "AMPE-Impact"), "IMPACT; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(BU__c, "Eur-Impact"), "IMPACT; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(BU__c, "Asia-Impact"), "IMPACT; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(BU__c, "Balance Sheet"), "BS; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(BU__c, "Credit"), "CREDIT; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(BU__c, "Global Impact"), "IMPACT; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(BU__c, "NBFC"), "NBFC; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(BU__c, "Mezzanine"), "MEZZ; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(BU__c, "Strategic Investments Group"), "SIG; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(BU__c, "Hedge Fund"), "HF; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(BU__c, "AMPE - Middle Market"), "AMPE-MM; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(BU__c, "Asia Climate"), "ASIA CLIMATE; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(BU__c, "Americas + EMEA Climate"), "CLIMATE TRANSITION; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(BU__c, "TBD"), "TBD; ", NULL) + ".", "; .", NULL)
CustomField.label: Business (Reporting)
